Board.name: piano_player
Board.author: Beth Hadley
Board.title: Piano Player
Board.description: Explore music composition and the notes on a keybaord
Board.goal: To understand how the notes of the keyboard can be written and recorded
Board.manual:
This activity has six levels. Each level adds a new function to explore. The final level, level six, provides all functions and can be used as a composition tool for students to save and load their work. Each level adds one additional feature while keeping the previous feature as an option.
The levels: 1. treble clef 2. bass clef 3. quarter, half, and whole notes 4. black keys as sharp notes 5. black keys as flat notes 6. load and save
